title: game crash cant reconect

replies.body: Hey there, you might have some bad game files or drivers that causing your game to crash.  I recommend sticking to custom games while troubleshooting, to prevent any further [leaverbuster](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752714-LeaverBuster-FAQ) penalties.  Run through the steps in our [game crash](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes+) guide to help get this fixed up.

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=0swoAEaR,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2017-11-03T16:13:18.987+0000)
>
> Hey there, you might have some bad game files or drivers that causing your game to crash.  I recommend sticking to custom games while troubleshooting, to prevent any further [leaverbuster](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752714-LeaverBuster-FAQ) penalties.  Run through the steps in our [game crash](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes+) guide to help get this fixed up.
